content.text:
# 1927 Holy Cross Crusaders football team

The 1927 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1927 college football season.  In its ninth season under head coach Cleo A. O'Donnell, the team compiled a 6â€“3 record. The team played its home games at Fitton Field in Worcester, Massachusetts.
